name: Flyfar
tagline: Do you have what it takes to fly a plane in WWII, taking supplies to your comrades hidden behind enemy lines?
body: You are an airplane pilot in WWII and you must make it as far as you can into enemy territory before time runs out in order to drop critical supplies to the soldiers hiding behind enemy spies! If you don't get close enough to the troops, you lose!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
